tweet: This Ukraine development weighs very heavily, and is very concerning to me. I believe it is time now to open an inquiry for impeachment. We have to get the facts. pic.twitter.com/S9rvKGtJzm

@FSCDems advanced my bipartisan bill HR4067, the Financial Inclusion in Banking Act. I look forward to continue working to ensure that all Americans have access to safe and affordable banking services. https://davidscott.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=398297 …

With 8.4 million U.S. households that are unbanked, I'm proud to sponsor H.R. 4067, the Financial Inclusion Banking Act. My bill will identify the hurdles that unbanked and underbanked consumers face as well as strategies to increase financial education. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PN9r4HjLHME …
